Articles.Content: Hi there, I'm MrTyTheGreat ( pronounced Mister tie the great.) I'm  (obviously) new here. I can also be found on the simple planes forums. So, yeah! I really like aviaton so, most of the things you will be seeing from me will be planes. I just put a space shuttle in orbit today!

Hello MrTyTheGreat and welcome to the KSP forums!

There are many of us here who very much enjoy making and flying planes, especially spaceplanes.  Glad to have you aboard.

Happy landings!

2 hours ago, Starhawk said:

Hello MrTyTheGreat and welcome to the KSP forums!

Thanks!
